column4: I was pointed to a wiki, Jowi, that told me to edit my sources list and type a command that downloaded a whole bunch of stuff and then installed it... I tried to reboot afterwards and it locked up so I had to power off the tower and power it back on, now it's all broken

It goes to the Ubuntu logo where it says a bunch of stuff and '[OK] ', then when it tries to start X Server it says that it's failed and then drops me to a command line. I've tried reconfiguring the x server thingy like someone else said, but it didn't work
If you have a windows install CD, boot from it and clear the partitions ubuntu is currently on
